name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Analytics Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering impactful data solutions across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **SQL**, **dbt**, **Airflow**, and cloud platforms including **Azure**. Experienced in data visualization tools such as **Looker** and **PowerBI**, enabling effective KPI reporting and insightful analytics. Skilled in **workflow automation** using tools like **Talend**, **n8n**, and **Make** while leveraging strong programming expertise in **Python** and **R**. Recognized for exceptional communication skills and stakeholder management, ensuring alignment of analytics strategies with business objectives.
Additionally, a full-stack development background with expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, and comprehensive technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in developing AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, utilizing microservices and event-driven architectures to enhance operational efficiency.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **SQL** and **dbt** for data transformation and preparation, optimizing ETL processes to ensure high-quality data sets for analytics.
Designed and maintained robust data pipelines using **Airflow** to automate workflows, achieving a **30%** increase in data processing efficiency.
Leveraged **Azure**, **Snowflake**, and **BigQuery** to build scalable data solutions, integrating diverse data sources to support analytics and business intelligence initiatives.
Developed insightful dashboards and reports in **PowerBI** and **Looker**, delivering actionable insights on **KPI** performance and trends, enabling stakeholders to make informed decisions.
Created advanced **data visualization** tools and techniques, enhancing the representation of operational metrics and performance indicators by **25%** for improved stakeholder communication.
Implemented **workflow automation** using **Talend**, **n8n**, and **Make**, drastically reducing manual data handling efforts and increasing overall team productivity by **40%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, ensuring alignment with stakeholder needs leveraging strong **communication** and **stakeholder management** skills.
Analyzed large datasets using **Python** and **R** to identify key insights and drive strategic initiatives, leading to a **15%** improvement in project outcomes.
Participated in regular meetings with stakeholders to present findings and recommendations, fostering a data-driven culture within the organization.

Leveraged **SQL** and **dbt** to optimize database queries and improve data transformation workflows, enhancing reporting efficiency by **30%**.
Implemented **Airflow** for orchestrating complex data workflows, enabling automated data pipelines that process over **1 million** records daily.
Utilized **Azure** and **Snowflake** to ensure scalable data storage and analytics solutions, reducing query times by **25%** for critical reporting metrics.
Developed interactive data visualizations and dashboards using **Looker** and **PowerBI**, enabling stakeholders to derive insights from data and track **KPI** metrics effectively.
Automated workflows with tools like **Talend**, **n8n**, and **Make** to streamline data integration processes, increasing operational efficiency by **40%**.
Applied advanced **Python** and **R** techniques to perform data analyses, empowering business decisions by delivering actionable insights.
Engaged in effective **communication** and **stakeholder management**, ensuring alignment between technical solutions and business objectives through regular updates and strategy sessions.

Utilized **SQL** and **BigQuery** for data extraction and analysis, contributing to data-driven decision-making processes that improved overall business KPIs by **25%**.
Automated data workflows with **Airflow**, resulting in optimized data pipeline efficiency and reducing processing time by **30%**.
Developed and maintained data models in **Snowflake**, enhancing reporting capabilities and data visualization accuracy within **Looker** and **PowerBI**.
Implemented **dbt** for data transformation, ensuring high-quality analytics and streamlined reporting across the organization.
Engineered KPI dashboards that provided real-time insights and facilitated strategic discussions with stakeholders, improving communication and project alignment.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify workflow automation opportunities with tools like **n8n** and **Make**, reducing manual processes by **40%**.
Leveraged **Azure** cloud services to enhance data storage solutions, ensuring seamless integration and accessibility for analytics applications.
Applied **Python** and **R** for advanced statistical analyses and predictive modeling, driving actionable insights and enhancing business performance.
Strengthened stakeholder management skills through effective communication of data findings, fostering stronger collaboration between technical and non-technical teams.

skills:
**Programming Languages:**

	MLflow, Kubeflow, dbt, Looker, PowerBI, KPI, data visualization, workflow automation, Talend, n8n, Make, communication, stakeholder management
